A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Take everything you love about star wars\, then chuck it out the window with this movie. Oh\, you like Luke and his never give up attitude? Too bad\, he is a grumpy old man that gave up on everyone and goes out like a pussy. Do you like all the mysteries set up by the last movie? None of it matters and you just need to forget about it. It feels like the two directors/writers were playing ping pong with the plot and we all are suffering. I enjoyed the prequels more because even with their cheesy writing and bad acting\, they had a decent plot and stayed true to the characters.
